unnormalised: Rental Agreements Getting a Makeover in Mumbai, Delhi!
normalised: Rental Agreements Getting a Makeover in Mumbai, Delhi!

unnormalised: Hey folks! Renting in India is about to get a bit smoother. Forget those handwritten agreements on stamp paper (we've all been there, right?). Looks like things are finally catching up with the 21st century.
normalised: Hey folks! Renting in India is about to get a bit smoother. Forget those handwritten agreements on stamp paper (we've all been there, right?). Looks like things are finally catching up with the twenty first century.

unnormalised: New digital platforms are popping up, promising easier agreement creation and verification. Think less running around and more convenience, like ordering your chai online!
normalised: New digital platforms are popping up, promising easier agreement creation and verification. Think less running around and more convenience, like ordering your chai online!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Real Estate Council of India suggests these platforms could streamline the process significantly, reducing disputes and making life easier for both landlords and tenants, especially in bustling cities like Mumbai and Delhi.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Real Estate Council of India suggests these platforms could streamline the process significantly, reducing disputes and making life easier for both landlords and tenants, especially in bustling cities like Mumbai and Delhi.

unnormalised: Plus, imagine avoiding those hefty brokerage fees (Rs. 20,000+!). These platforms often offer direct landlord-tenant connections.
normalised: Plus, imagine avoiding those hefty brokerage fees (rupees twenty thousand plus!). These platforms often offer direct landlord-tenant connections.

unnormalised: Agreements will be standardized, covering key clauses like maintenance responsibilities and acceptable wear and tear (avoid those fights over that chipped paint!).
normalised: Agreements will be standardized, covering key clauses like maintenance responsibilities and acceptable wear and tear (avoid those fights over that chipped paint!).

unnormalised: One platform even offers options for including pet clauses - important for dog lovers in Gurgaon searching for that perfect 800 sq ft apartment!
normalised: One platform even offers options for including pet clauses - important for dog lovers in Gurgaon searching for that perfect eight hundred square feet apartment!

unnormalised: So, if you're planning on renting a place near Connaught Place or Bandra, keep an eye out for these digital rental agreement solutions. Time to say goodbye to those frustrating rental processes!
normalised: So, if you're planning on renting a place near Connaught Place or Bandra, keep an eye out for these digital rental agreement solutions. Time to say goodbye to those frustrating rental processes!
